page.title: 13Ashbourne Tourism
page.content: Ashbourne's tourist trade is increasing.It is popular because of the many attractions such as the{park with its{band stand}and{childen's {play ground.}It is a good shopping centre with markets on Thursdays and Saturdays.There are also plenty of hotels and cafes for visitors' use. Tourists like the historic buildings such as{St.Oswald's Church}and{Queen {Elizabeth's Grammar School. Historical figures connected with Ashbourne include{Dr.Johnson}and {Catherine Booth. {Sports facilities}include swimming, Squash,Cycling,golf, tennis, bowls, horse riding and camping. Above all Ashbourne is surrounded by the beautiful Derbyshire countryside and is known as{"The Gateway To {Dovedale."
